text:
Recommended ingestion order for optimal semantic clustering in Vectorize:

1. Foundational sections: 001–003
2. Early career / previous roles: 004–007
3. MTDCNC overview and details: 008–018
4. Repositories and configuration files: 019–024
5. Workflow diagrams: 025–028
6. Technical and soft skills matrices: 029–030
7. Attributes, architecture, personal capabilities: 031–033
8. Video/AV/Production-specific chunks: 033–036
9. Tools, clients, achievements: 038–040
10. Hardware, compression, CRM engineering: 041–043
11. Final professional summary: 044
12. Index chunks: 045–046

This order ensures:
- Correct grouping of related content
- High retrieval accuracy
- Lower semantic noise during question answering
